Class AbstractClientHttpResponse

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.http.client.reactive.AbstractClientHttpResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientHttpResponse, HttpMessage, ReactiveHttpInputMessage
public abstract class AbstractClientHttpResponse extends Object implements ClientHttpResponse
Base class for ClientHttpResponse implementations.
Since:
5.3.32
Author:
Arjen Poutsma
